meanings.definition: The quality or state of being level.
meanings.sent1: The levelnesses of the table made it easy to place the vase without it tipping over.
meanings.sent2: She admired the levelnesses of the playing field, ensuring fair competition for all.
meanings.sent3: The levelnesses of the cake layers were so perfect that they looked like they came from a professional bakery.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor and levelnesses of emotion made him a great leader in times of crisis.
meanings.sent5: The levelnesses of the road made for a smooth and enjoyable drive through the countryside.

meanings.definition: The act of leveling or making something level.
meanings.sent1: The construction workers were praised for their quick levelnesses of the ground before building the new house.
meanings.sent2: His levelnesses of the playing field ensured a fair game for all the participants.
meanings.sent3: The levelnesses of the sandcastle competition turned into a friendly rivalry among the participants.
meanings.sent4: Her determination and levelnesses of effort in her studies paid off with excellent grades.
meanings.sent5: The levelnesses of the painting job made the walls look brand new and flawless.
